subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Donnie Walsh, the Knicks’s president of basketball operations, hinted that while the team is pining to get rid of Stephon Marbury, he is entertaining the idea of playing him.
snippet: Donnie Walsh, the Knicks’s president of basketball operations, hinted that while the team is pining to get rid of Stephon Marbury, he is entertaining the idea of playing him.
